items.title: Don’t swing for the fences even as the stock market scales worries, says Citi. Here’s its barbell portfolio.
items.description: Investors should take a more prudent approach during a volatile first half of 2025

items.title: Unexpectedly dovish Bank of England decision sends pound and yields lower
items.description: The Bank of England on Thursday cut interest rates by a quarter-point, its third reduction since August.

items.title: Honeywell to split into three companies, but stock drops as outlook disappoints
items.description: Honeywell plans to split into three separate companies, The Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, news that sent shares surging.

items.title: My stepfather’s children told me they plan to buy the house he shares with my mother. I stopped them in their tracks.
items.description: “I discovered that the default deed in Illinois is tenants in common — not joint tenants with the right of survivorship.”

items.title: A microchip material maker sees its worst day in 11 years. Ken Griffin’s Citadel wins big.
items.description: A microchip materials manufacturer that counts Taiwan Semiconductor, GlobalFoundries and STMicroelectronics as clients saw its stock plunge on Thursda...
